name: Time Spenders
description:
What is Time Spenders?   A simple little game based around time-Where you collect time in the form of days and then buy upgrades which increase how fast time travels. Goal of the game

At the moment, there is no real "goal"

Being there is only 5 upgrades available currently and being really early in dev

Dev goals
  1. Save and load feature
  2. More Upgrades 
  3. More Balancing
  4. Introduce end goal into game
  5. Bug fixes
  6. And just more general gameplay
Controls

U: is used to get to the upgrades page

B: is used to get back to the previous page

Enter: is used in the shop after typing in the Corresponding number for the upgrade to apply the upgrade; And used to pass time;
